organic: Ɛho nhia sɛ yɛyɛ biribiara, wo nnɔbae no te apɔw
chemical: Ɛho nhia sɛ yɛyɛ biribiara, wo nnɔbae no te apɔw
Ɛfata sɛ wokɔ so yɛ nea woreyɛ de besi saa bere yi.

causes: Yare no fi mmoawa Puccinia Sorghi. Mmoawa a ɛwɔ mmoawa yi mu no tumi fa mframa ne osu kɔ akyirikyiri. Wɔhyɛ yare no ase bere a wɔtete nnua no so.

organic: Saa berɛ yi, ayaresa foforɔ biara nni hɔ a wɔde bɛsi yareɛ yi ho dwuma. Yɛ update system no daa, hwɛ bio akyiri yi anaa twe bɛn yɛn wɔ mmoa kratafa no so
chemical: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ yiye a, susuw akwan a wɔbɛfa so adi dwuma a ɛne ano aduru ho nhyehyɛe a ɛne nnuru a wɔde siw yare ano ne nnuru a wɔde siw yare ano ho nhyehyɛe a ɛne no hyia ho.
Sɛ wɔde nnuru a wɔde kum nkosua di dwuma wɔ nnua ahorow a etumi hu yare no so a, ebetumi ayɛ mfaso
Fa nwura mu ntini a wɔde kum nkekaboa gu wɔ bere a wɔretetew nnua no mfiase no, sɛ ewim tebea nti, ntini no bɛtrɛw ntɛmntɛm a
Wɔwɔ nnuru a wɔde kum nkosua pii a wɔde di awuduru so, wobetumi de nnuro a ekura mancozeb, pyraclostrobin + metconazole, pyraclostrobin + fluxapyroxad adi dwuma de adi yare no so.
Nhwɛsoɔ a wɔde yɛ aduru no bi ne sɛ wɔbɛsɔ mancozeb mu 2.5 g/l ntɛm ara a apɔmuten no pue na wɔsan yɛ no wɔ nnafua 10 ntam kosi sɛ nhwiren no bɛfefɛw.

preventive_measures: Nnua ahorow a enni yare wɔ beae hɔ
dua no ntɛm sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yareɛ no remma
fa nnua ahorow a wɔabrɛ ase a enyin ntɛm
Hwɛ sɛ yare no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne wɔ afuw no mu bere nyinaa, titiriw bere a ewim ayɛ kusuu no
Hwɛ sɛ wobɛma afuo no so atew wɔ ɔkwan a ɛfata so denam nitrogen a wɔde di dwuma wɔ akwan horow so so

organic: Saa berɛ yi, ayaresa foforɔ biara nni hɔ a wɔde bɛsi yareɛ yi ho dwuma. Yɛ update system no daa, hwɛ bio akyiri yi anaa twe bɛn yɛn wɔ mmoa kratafa no so

chemical: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ yiye a, susuw akwan a wɔbɛfa so asiesie wo ho ne nnuru a wɔde siw yare ano ho
Sɛ wɔde nnuru a wɔde kum nkosua a wɔn ho yɛ hu di dwuma wɔ nnua ahorow a wɔn ho yɛ hu so a, ebetumi ayɛ mfaso
Hwehwɛ mmoa fi nnuruyɛfo a wɔwɔ mpɔtam hɔ a wobetumi ama woayɛ aduru a ɛfata paa a egyina yare no aniberesɛm so.
